message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been canceled.
This determination may not be completed as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_ALREADY_COMPLETED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_ALREADY_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been superseded.

message.name: ERR_SINGLE_DETERMINATION__CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED_CANCELLATION_CAN_BE_DONE_AT_ASSESSMENTLEVEL
message.locale: This determination cannot be canceled as it is the only determination in this assessment.Cancellation must be done at the assessment level.
This determination cannot be cancelled as it is the only determination in this assessment.Cancellation must be done at the assessment level.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_ALREADY_COMPLETED_THEREFORE_DETERMINATION_MAYNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination may not be canceled as it has already been completed.
This determination may not be cancelled as it has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_ALREADY_CANCELLED_THEREFORE_DETERMINATION_MAYNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination may not be canceled as it has already been canceled.
This determination may not be cancelled as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_ALREADY_SUPERSEDED_THEREFORE_DETERMINATION_MAYNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination may not be canceled as it has already been superseded.
This determination may not be cancelled as it has already been superseded.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_CANCELLED_DETERMINATION_CANNOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been canceled.
This determination may not be completed as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_COMPLETED_DETERMINATION_CANNOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_SUPERSEDED_DETERMINATION_CANNOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: This determination may not be completed as it has already been superseded.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_COMPLETED_CANNOT_CREATE_DECISION
message.locale: Decision cannot be created as this determination has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_CREATE_DECISION
message.locale: Decision cannot be created as this determination has already been canceled.
Decision cannot be created as this determination has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_SUPERSEDED_CANNOT_CREATE_DECISION
message.locale: Decision cannot be created as this determination has already been superseded.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: A change in circumstance may not be recorded for this determination as the determination has already been canceled.
A change in circumstance may not be recorded for this determination as the determination has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: A change in circumstance may not be recorded for this determination as the determination is still In Progress.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_SUPERSEDED_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: A change in circumstance may not be recorded for this determination as the determination has already been superseded.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS_OF_SAME_TYPE_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: An In Progress determination of this type already exists. Please make your changes to the In Progress determination.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_EFFECTIVE_DATE_BEFORE_DETERMINATION_START_DATE
message.locale: The effective date entered is before the start date of the determination %1d. Please enter a new effective date.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_EFFECTIVE_DATE_AFTER_DETERMINATION_END_DATE
message.locale: The effective date entered is after the end date of the determination %1d. Please enter a new effective date.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATION_DELIVERY_NO_DP_AVAILABLE_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: There are no decision making criteria available for this Determination for this Effective Date. Please enter a new Effective Date or select Cancel to exit.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_COMPLETED_CANNOT_RECORD_CHANGE_OF_CIRCUMSTANCE
message.locale: The assessment is completed, change of circumstance cannot be recorded.
